org.mini2Dx.ecs.entity

Class GameScreenEntity

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.mini2Dx.ecs.entity.Entity
      • org.mini2Dx.ecs.entity.GameScreenEntity
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    GameScreen, ComponentStore

    public abstract class GameScreenEntity
extends Entity
implements GameScreen
    An implementation of Entity that also implements GameScreen This Entity will update/interpolate/render in a depth-first order, i.e. it will find the deepest descendant in the tree and execute update/interpolate/render on the UpdatableComponents/ RenderableComponents of that first before traversing up the tree until it reaches this entity
